entry.title: Python Network Programming with Asyncore
entry.content:
This is my experiment of setting up client-server relationships via: 1. Multi-threading 2. Event-driven: select statements 3. Event-driven: asyncore

  • Discussion of benefits between thread-based vs event-based approach, when you would use one over the other, etc
